name: Dicegeon
description:
⚜️You are a brave knight sent on a quest to defeat the evil dice creatures while exploring the dangerous dicegeon.⚜️

In this game you need to defend against the creatures that will come to attack you.

📌How to play:

In order to make the weapons fire, select the dice and drop them into the weapon of choice so when the gun rolls the numbers, if it matches the dice it shoots.

📌Attention:

- You can take dice from other turrets and reuse the dice.

- Attack Weapons (crossbows and flamethrowers) have different reload times.

- Different Items have different cooldowns, proposes and different affected areas.
